event.title: Photoshoot
event.text: There was a meet up for all of the cosplays for one of your favorite video games. Primarily kept to yourself throughout the event, you enjoyed taking photos of the cosplayers.

event.title: Figurine Give-away
event.text: At a figurine speciality booth, they were giving away merchandise! You waited in line patiently and was able to get a figurine to add to your bookshelf.

event.title: Question and Answer Panel
event.text: There was a question and answer panel for the cast of one of your favorite TV shows. You sat in the audience as you get to know more about the actors you idolize.

event.title: Maid Cafe
event.text: There was a cafe were all of the servers were dressed up as butlers and maids. You ordered a coffee and sat by yourself enjoying the atmosphere and the people watching.

event.title: Anime Karaoke
event.text: You saw that there was a karaoke competition specifically for popular songs from Japan. You sat in the audience as you watched a handful of people sing their hearts out to anime theme songs and idol tracks.

event.title: Saturday Night Rave
event.text: In the late night, there was a rave going on at one of the dance halls. Attending the rave, you stood in the corner as you enjoyed people watching and listening to the music.

event.title: Celebrity Signing
event.text: At one of the booths, a popular actor from one of your favorite superhero movies was doing a celebrity signing. After waiting in line, you got a poster signed with the actor's name on it.

event.title: Game Demo
event.text: A game company was at the convention letting people try out their multiplayer arena game that was set to release soon. You didn't play the game, but you watched as others did for a bit. It looked like a blast!

event.title: Magic Show
event.text: There was a magic show event where the magician would recreate famous special moves from video games and anime. You sat in the audience in amazement as the magician went through his routine.

event.title: Idol Concert
event.text: There was a music concert where a popular idol group from Japan was performing their hit songs. You watched the concert from the corner of the dance floor enjoying the show and the music.

event.title: Dance Off
event.text: There was an epic dance battle where two teams would take turns out-dance each other to popular Japanese music. You sat in the audience in amazement watching some people break dance and bust moves that you thought wasn't humanly possible.

event.title: Human Chess Match
event.text: There was a human chess match going on where the person taking the place of the king would give commands to the other pieces. You watched from the sidelines coming up with your own strategies as the match went on.

event.title: Game of Ninja
event.text: There was a massive fifty-person game of ninja taking place in an open area of the convention center. It looked interesting, but you didn't know what was going on. You did enjoy watching the game though.

event.title: Quiz Show
event.text: There was a game show-like event where there were two teams of five going at it with their knowledge of anime trivia. You sat in the audience answering each question to yourself.

event.title: Open Mic
event.text: There was an open mic event where people can sign up to perform on stage for 10 minutes at a time. You sat quietly in the audience enjoying the comedians, musicians, and magicians that performed on stage.

event.title: LARP Battle
event.text: There was a live-action role play battle event where people were given padded weapons to re-enact a famous war scene from an anime. You watched on the sidelines laughing as the participants fought each other with foam swords and acted out the scenes.

event.title: TCG Competition
event.text: There was a trading card game tournament at one of the event halls with 64 tournament participants. You missed most of the tournament, but you did get to watch the top players duke it out in the grand finals.

event.title: Painting Event
event.text: There was an event where a famous manga artist would provide hands-on painting lessons to the people participating. You participated in the event, but mainly kept to yourself throughout the lessons.

event.title: Table Top Gaming
event.text: There was a room full of popular table top games where people can play and join games with others. You combed the room looking for a game that you'd like to play, but didn't really find anything.

event.title: Dating Auction
event.text: There was an event where people would "buy" another person's time in an auction house setting. You laughed your bottom off seeing how much certain people would "sell" for.

event.title: Bar Meetup
event.text: There was a meet up at the hotel bar for alcohol enthusiasts. You made an appearance at the meet up, but primarily kept to yourself.

event.title: Anime Theory Debates
event.text: There was an event where the host would provide two sides of a controversial topic in an anime and two teams would debate for their given side. You enjoyed the show as you watched the heated debate take place.

event.title: Loutube Interview
event.text: There were cameras set up for a popular Loutube channel where the host would interview random passer-bys. Curious as to what the channel was, you looked on as the host would interview random people.

event.title: Would you Survive in a Zombie Apocalypse?
event.text: There was an interactive game where participants simulate whether or not they would survive a zombie apocalypse. Taking part of the game, you unfortunately had a bad starting point and got zombified pretty early on.

event.title: Free Food
event.text: There was an announcement on the speakers saying that the food trucks are serving free food as a promotion for the day. Making your way to the back of the line, you waited patiently until you were able to order and enjoy your food.

event.title: Anime Viewing Session
event.text: There was a viewing session for the first episode of a new anime that has yet to be released. Always a fan of new anime, you sat among the audience and enjoyed the exhilarating fight scenes and fan service.

event.title: Ball Pit
event.text: There was a decently sized above-ground ball pit set up in an open area of the convention. Walking passed, you looked on as people seemed to be having a lot of fun.

event.title: Mech Piloting
event.text: There was a small stage dedicated for people to prototype a small mech suit from Japan. You watched in amazement as people were trying to get it to walk in the pilot's seat.

event.title: Anime Bingo
event.text: There was a game of anime bingo going on in one of the rooms in the convention center. You got to witness the game taking place to the end of the event.

event.title: Swimming Pool Event
event.text: There was a large pool party going on in the hotel by the convention. You sat down on a beach chair enjoying the music and the good weather.

event.title: Artist Alley Give-away
event.text: Walking through artist alley, you saw a crowd around one stall throwing away free merchandise. You stood in the crowd and was able to catch a fedora!

event.title: Live Pod-Cast Show
event.text: Your favorite podcasting group was hosting a live podcast recording session at the convention. Not wanting to miss out on your favorite podcast, you sat in the session. Maybe your cough made it onto the recording!

event.title: Para-para Dance Lessons
event.text: A professional dance crew was giving a group dance lesson for the Japanese originated para-para dance. You quietly partook in the lesson, having a blast while learning all you can about para-para dancing!

event.title: Improv Show
event.text: There was a group of comedians doing an improv show at the auditorium. You got to witness the comedians make joke after joke enjoying the acts they put up.

event.title: Vocaloid Concert
event.text: There was a music concert where a Japanese vocaloid hologram was performing her hit songs. You watched the concert from the corner of the dance floor being amused by the show and the music.

event.title: Bubble Tea Tasting
event.text: There was a bubble tea tasting event where participants can customize their own bubble tea. The bubble tea you created turned out to be decent.

event.title: Voice Actor's Meetup
event.text: One of your favorite voice actors of all time was hosting an event at the convention. You sat in the event and listened to the voice actor doing the voice of your favorite fictional characters.

event.title: Koto and Sake Tasting Event
event.text: For the 21 and over crowd, there was a Japanese alcohol tasting social event. You stood by the table with the drinks enjoying the taste of the koto and sake to yourself.

event.title: Cosplay Runway
event.text: There was a cosplay fashion show event where judges would rate a person's cosplay as they would walk down an isle. Attending the event, you enjoyed viewing some of the more intricate cosplays that people made.

event.title: Anime Lazer Tag
event.text: There was a room dedicated to a lazer tag competition where the weapons and the setting was based off of a futuristic anime. You watched from the outside as the two teams battled it out in a close match!

event.title: Virtual Reality Demo
event.text: There was a kiosk with a high quality VR set up where users can roam around a Japanese high school environment. There was a display showing what the person was doing in the VR environment.

event.title: Anime Retrospective
event.text: There was an all-day event dedicated to showcasing old anime from the 1970's - 1990's. While watching classic anime, you felt an appreciation for the ancestry of one of your favorite past times.

event.title: Celebrity Cosplayer
event.text: An internet famous cosplayer was making an appearance at the convention. You were able to get a few good pictures of her in artist alley with hundreds of other photographers.

event.title: Celebrity Lip Reading
event.text: There was an event where multiple celebrity voice actors were reading excerpts from a horrid book. You laughed as the voice actors spoke out the sex-scenes in their unfitting voices.

event.title: Free Comic Book Day
event.text: Walking through artist alley, you noticed a comic book kiosk giving away a select few comics. Without saying a word, you grabbed one comic book.

event.title: Dating Advice
event.text: There was an event where a popular Loutuber was giving advice about dating. You sat in the audience and learned a thing or two!

event.title: Mechanical Bull Ride
event.text: An energy drink company was hosting a mechanical bull ride in artist alley where participants could see how long they could last against the bull. You witnessed a very attractive girl try it out.

event.title: The Grandfather of Anime
event.text: One of the original artists of classic anime movies was making an appearance at the convention. You satin the back of a massive auditorium as he spoke about his creations. It feels good to be in the same room as the grandfather of anime!

event.title: Interactive Display
event.text: Looking above, there was a large TV displaying other rooms in the convention. You got to see a bunch of cool areas you haven't checked out yet!

event.title: Speed Dating
event.text: There was a speed dating event at the convention where you went on quick two-minute dates with a handful of women. You didn't get any dates, but you had fun socializing with the opposite gender.

event.title: Photoshoot
event.text: There was a meet up for all of the cosplays for one of your favorite video games. You took some photos of the cosplayers and got to talk with some of the photographers showing each other the photos you took.

event.title: Figurine Give-away
event.text: At a figurine speciality booth, they were giving away merchandise! You socialized with another person in line while the two of you waited for your free figurine.

event.title: Question and Answer Panel
event.text: There was a question and answer panel for the cast of one of your favorite TV shows. You sat in the audience as you get to know more about the actors you idolize. You got to socialize with some of the people that you were sitting next to.

event.title: Maid Cafe
event.text: There was a cafe were all of the servers were dressed up as butlers and maids. You ordered a coffee and spent a while talking to the waitress in a maid costume.

event.title: Anime Karaoke
event.text: You saw that there was a karaoke competition specifically for popular songs from Japan. You sat in the audience as you watched a handful of people sing their hearts out. In between performances, you socialized with the people around you.

event.title: Saturday Night Rave
event.text: In the late night, there was a rave going on at one of the dance halls. Attending the rave, you wandered the dance floor dancing every so often while enjoying the music and the people.

event.title: Celebrity Signing
event.text: At one of the booths, a popular actor from one of your favorite superhero movies was doing a celebrity signing. After getting a poster signed by the actor, you asked the actor a question you had about the movies to which he replied.

event.title: Game Demo
event.text: A game company was at the convention letting people try out their multiplayer arena game that was set to release soon. You got to play the game on your own when the stall was less populated.

event.title: Magic Show
event.text: There was a magic show event where the magician would recreate famous special moves from video games and anime. You sat in the audience socializing with the people around you as the magician went through his routine.

event.title: Idol Concert
event.text: There was a music concert where a popular idol group from Japan was performing their hit songs. You jumped and danced along to the music to yourself and had a great time.

event.title: Dance Off
event.text: There was an epic dance battle where two teams would take turns out-dance each other to popular Japanese music. You sat in the audience and socialized with the people around you being amazed by the performances.

event.title: Human Chess Match
event.text: There was a human chess match going on where the person taking the place of the king would give commands to the other pieces. You signed up to participate and got drafted as a pawn. Unfortunately, you got captured pretty early on in the match.

event.title: Game of Ninja
event.text: There was a massive fifty-person game of ninja taking place in an open area of the convention center. It looked interesting, so you asked somebody next to you how to play as the game was going on.

event.title: Quiz Show
event.text: There was a game show-like event where there were two teams of five going at it with their knowledge of anime trivia. Sitting in the audience, you socialized with the person next to you as the two of you answered each question.

event.title: Open Mic
event.text: There was an open mic event where people can sign up to perform on stage for 10 minutes at a time. You socialized with others in the audience as amateur comedians, musicians, and magicians performed their acts on stage.

event.title: LARP Battle
event.text: There was a live-action role play battle event where people were given padded weapons to re-enact a famous war scene from an anime. You participated in the war as a soldier with no name.

event.title: TCG Competition
event.text: There was a trading card game tournament at one of the event halls with 64 tournament participants. You socialized with others about different strategies in the game as the participants battled their hearts out.

event.title: Painting Event
event.text: There was an event where a famous manga artist would provide hands-on painting lessons to the people participating. While painting, you socialized with the person next to you and compared your paintings with each other.

event.title: Table Top Gaming
event.text: There was a room full of popular table top games where people can play and join games with others. You found a complex board game to and played with 3 other people.

event.title: Dating Auction
event.text: There was an event where people would "buy" another person's time in an auction house setting. You tried to auction for a lovely lady, however you weren't getting paid that week and you lost her to a high bid. You had fun taking part of the event at least.

event.title: Bar Meetup
event.text: There was a meet up at the hotel bar for alcohol enthusiasts. You primarily stayed at the bar, talking briefly with those who sat next to you.

event.title: Anime Theory Debates
event.text: There was an event where the host would provide two sides of a controversial topic in an anime and two teams would debate for their given side. While the debates raged on, you socialized with somebody next to you with your own thoughts about the debate.

event.title: Loutube Interview
event.text: There were cameras set up for a popular Loutube channel where the host would interview random passer-bys. You socialized with somebody next to you trying to figure out what the channel was.

event.title: Would you Survive in a Zombie Apocalypse?
event.text: There was an interactive game where participants simulate whether or not they would survive a zombie apocalypse. Taking part of the game, you unfortunately had a bad starting point and got zombified early on. However you got to take down a few survivors.

event.title: Free Food
event.text: There was an announcement on the speakers saying that the food trucks are serving free food as a promotion for the day. Since the line was long, you conversed with the others in line to kill time.

event.title: Anime Viewing Session
event.text: There was a viewing session for the first episode of a new anime that has yet to be released. After viewing the anime, you discussed your favorite scenes with the person sitting next to you.

event.title: Ball Pit
event.text: There was a decently sized above-ground ball pit set up in an open area of the convention. A few balls rolled towards you as you were passed the pit. You stopped to throw the balls back into the pit as some one in the pit thanked you.

event.title: Mech Piloting
event.text: There was a small stage dedicated for people to prototype a small mech suit from Japan. You asked a bystander if they got a chance to pilot it. They didn't, but the two of you got to talk about robotics while watching people try it out.

event.title: Anime Bingo
event.text: There was a game of anime bingo going on in one of the rooms in the convention center. You joined in, but unfortunately you weren't close to winning. At least you had some fun!

event.title: Swimming Pool Event
event.text: There was a large pool party going on in the hotel by the convention. You sat down on a beach chair enjoying the music and even had a conversation with another person at the party.

event.title: Artist Alley Give-away
event.text: Walking through artist alley, you saw a crowd around one stall throwing away free merchandise. You stood in the crowd and was able to catch a fedora and a few other trinkets!

event.title: Live Pod-Cast Show
event.text: Your favorite podcasting group was hosting a live podcast recording session at the convention. You participated as an audience member whenever they prompted the audience for a response. You really got to feel like a part of the podcast!

event.title: Para-para Dance Lessons
event.text: A professional dance crew was giving a group dance lesson for the Japanese originated para-para dance. After partaking in the dance lessons, another person in the class complimented you about how quickly you picked it up.

event.title: Improv Show
event.text: There was a group of comedians doing an improv show at the auditorium. Participating in the event, you laughed at every joke and participated when the comedians asked for audience input.

event.title: Vocaloid Concert
event.text: There was a music concert where a Japanese vocaloid hologram was performing her hit songs. You jumped and danced along to the music to yourself and had a great time.

event.title: Bubble Tea Tasting
event.text: There was a bubble tea tasting event where participants can customize their own bubble tea. The bubble tea you created turned out to be pretty good.

event.title: Voice Actor's Meetup
event.text: One of your favorite voice actors of all time was hosting an event at the convention. You listened to the voice actor doing the voice of your favorite characters. After the event, you spoke with an attendee as the two of you talked about the voice actor's previous roles.

event.title: Koto and Sake Tasting Event
event.text: For the 21 and over crowd, there was a Japanese alcohol tasting social event. You stood by the table with the drinks talking with those getting themselves a drink.

event.title: Cosplay Runway
event.text: There was a cosplay fashion show event where judges would rate a person's cosplay as they would walk down an isle. Attending the event, you enjoyed seeing the intricate cosplays that others have made. You discussed your favorite cosplays with the person sitting next to you.

event.title: Anime Lazer Tag
event.text: There was a room dedicated to a lazer tag competition where the weapons and the setting was based off of a futuristic anime. You participated in the event, but ended up losing in points with your team.

event.title: Virtual Reality Demo
event.text: There was a kiosk with a high quality VR set up where users can roam around a Japanese high school environment. There was a display showing what the person was doing in the VR environment where you spoke with another person watching the demo.

event.title: Anime Retrospective
event.text: There was an all-day event dedicated to showcasing old anime from the 1970's - 1990's. While watching classic anime, you discussed past anime with another person.

event.title: Celebrity Cosplayer
event.text: An internet famous cosplayer was making an appearance at the convention. You were able to get a few good pictures of her in the lobby with dozens of other photographers.

event.title: Celebrity Lip Reading
event.text: There was an event where multiple celebrity voice actors were reading excerpts from a horrid book. You got to take a far-away video of the voice actors reading through the book for yourself to view in the future.

event.title: Free Comic Book Day
event.text: Walking through artist alley, you noticed a comic book kiosk giving away a select few comics. You talked to the person working at the kiosk as you grabbed one comic book.

event.title: Dating Advice
event.text: There was an event where a popular Loutuber was giving advice about dating. Sitting in the audience, you participated whenever the speaker would prompt the audience for an answer.

event.title: Mechanical Bull Ride
event.text: An energy drink company was hosting a mechanical bull ride in artist alley where participants could see how long they could last against the bull. Watching others try the bull out, you were able to get a free energy drink sample.

event.title: The Grandfather of Anime
event.text: One of the original artists of classic anime movies was making an appearance at the convention. You satin the center of a massive auditorium as he spoke about his creations.

event.title: Interactive Display
event.text: Looking above, there was a large TV displaying other rooms in the convention. Noticing somebody on the display looking into the camera, so you waved to them. They waved back!

event.title: Speed Dating
event.text: There was a speed dating event at the convention where you went on quick two-minute dates with a handful of women. You didn't get any phone numbers, but you did get to hang out with some of the girls when the event ended.

event.title: Photoshoot
event.text: There was a meet up for all of the cosplays for one of your favorite video games. After speaking with the cosplayers, you got them to do some funny poses for pictures.

event.title: Figurine Give-away
event.text: At a figurine speciality booth, they were giving away merchandise! You socialized with the person running the booth and was able to get a higher quality figurine.

event.title: Question and Answer Panel
event.text: There was a question and answer panel for the cast of one of your favorite TV shows. You sat in the audience as you get to know more about the actors you idolize. You talked with the person next to you with questions that you would ask them.

event.title: Maid Cafe
event.text: There was a cafe were all of the servers were dressed up as butlers and maids. You ordered a coffee and conversed with a few of the customers during your stay at the cafe.

event.title: Anime Karaoke
event.text: You saw that there was a karaoke competition specifically for popular songs from Japan. You partook in the event by singing the theme song from one of your favorite anime. The audience loved you!

event.title: Saturday Night Rave
event.text: In the late night, there was a rave going on at one of the dance halls. You danced the night away until your legs got tired!

event.title: Celebrity Signing
event.text: At one of the booths, a popular actor from one of your favorite superhero movies was doing a celebrity signing. After getting your poster signed, you were able to speak with the actor even making him laugh.

event.title: Game Demo
event.text: A game company was at the convention letting people try out their multiplayer arena game that was set to release soon. You got to try out the new game with other people even taking some matches against them!

event.title: Magic Show
event.text: There was a magic show event where the magician would recreate famous special moves from video games and anime. The magician needed a volunteer and the person you were sitting next to got called up. Once the act was over, the two of you bonded over the magic act.

event.title: Idol Concert
event.text: There was a music concert where a popular idol group from Japan was performing their hit songs. You sang along to the music with everyone else and had a great time.

event.text: There was an epic dance battle where two teams would take turns out-dance each other to popular Japanese music. You sat in the audience hyping up those around you for the performances.

event.title: Human Chess Match

event.title: Game of Ninja
event.text: There was a massive fifty-person game of ninja taking place in an open area of the convention center. You participated in the game, but got eliminated pretty early on.

event.title: Quiz Show
event.text: There was a game show-like event where there were two teams of five going at it with their knowledge of anime trivia. You took part in the event and was drafted to a random team. Your team got a few of the questions right but was ultimately defeated.

event.title: Open Mic
event.text: There was an open mic event where people can sign up to perform on stage for 10 minutes at a time. You signed up to perform. While on stage, you performed a comedy bit to a lukewarm response.

event.title: LARP Battle
event.text: There was a live-action role play battle event where people were given padded weapons to re-enact a famous war scene from an anime. You participated in the war as a distinguished soldier in the anime, getting some wins.

event.title: TCG Competition
event.text: There was a trading card game tournament at one of the event halls with 64 tournament participants. Since you brought your deck, you participated in the tournament. Unfortunately you got eliminated pretty early in the tournament.

event.title: Painting Event
event.text: There was an event where a famous manga artist would provide hands-on painting lessons to the people participating. Your painting came out pretty well and the person next to you asked for tips.

event.title: Table Top Gaming
event.text: There was a room full of popular table top games where people can play and join games with others. You played a popular board game with 7 other players.

event.title: Dating Auction
event.text: There was an event where people would "buy" another person's time in an auction house setting. You participated in the event as an auction piece, but you didn't sell for too high. The actual date was kind of lukewarm as you two didn't really bond over anything.

event.text: There was a meet up at the hotel bar for alcohol enthusiasts. You sat with a group of people at a table, keeping mostly to the group for the entire meet up.

event.title: Anime Theory Debates

event.text: There were cameras set up for a popular Loutube channel where the host would interview random passer-bys. You were briefly interviewed by the host for a single word response.

event.text: There was an event where multiple celebrity voice actors were reading excerpts from a horrid book. You got to take a decent video of the voice actors reading through the book, laughing as they read the sex scenes in funny voices.

event.title: Free Comic Book Day
event.text: Walking through artist alley, you noticed a comic book kiosk giving away a select few comics. You talked to the person working at the kiosk as you grabbed a few comic books.

event.title: Dating Advice
event.text: There was an event where a popular Loutuber was giving advice about dating. The speaker asked for volunteers for a demonstration. You raised your hand, but you were not selected.

event.title: Mechanical Bull Ride
event.text: An energy drink company was hosting a mechanical bull ride in artist alley where participants could see how long they could last against the bull. You decided to try it out... and almost instantly fell off. But hey, you tried!

event.title: The Grandfather of Anime
event.text: One of the original artists of classic anime movies was making an appearance at the convention. You sat close to the front of a massive auditorium as he spoke about his creations.

event.title: Interactive Display
event.text: Looking above, there was a large TV displaying other rooms in the convention. Noticing somebody on the display looking into the camera, so you stood in front of the camera and had a wordless conversation with them.

event.title: Speed Dating
event.text: There was a speed dating event at the convention where you went on quick two-minute dates with a handful of women. After the event was over you hung out with a few of the girls you met and added a few of them on MyFace.

event.title: Photoshoot
event.text: There was a meet up for all of the cosplays for one of your favorite video games. You took some photos of the cosplayers and got to talk with some of them asking for certain photos in specific poses. You were able to exchange contact information so you can meet up with them next time.

event.title: Figurine Give-away
event.text: At a figurine speciality booth, they were giving away merchandise! You befriended the person running the booth and was able to get a higher quality figurine.

event.title: Question and Answer Panel
event.text: There was a question and answer panel for the cast of one of your favorite TV shows. You were able to ask the actors directly your questions.

event.title: Maid Cafe
event.text: There was a cafe were all of the servers were dressed up as butlers and maids. You ordered a coffee and was able to make new friends with the people there.

event.title: Anime Karaoke
event.text: You saw that there was a karaoke competition specifically for popular songs from Japan. You convinced another to join you as the two of you sang a theme song from an anime. The audience loved you two!

event.title: Saturday Night Rave
event.text: In the late night, there was a rave going on at one of the dance halls. You were dancing to yourself, but there was a group of friends dancing next to you. You turned around and started dancing with them.

event.title: Celebrity Signing
event.text: At one of the booths, a popular actor from one of your favorite superhero movies was doing a celebrity signing. After getting your poster signed, you convinced the actor for a selfie.

event.title: Game Demo
event.text: A game company was at the convention letting people try out their multiplayer arena game that was set to release soon. You were doing so well that people started to gather around to watch you play.

event.title: Magic Show
event.text: There was a magic show event where the magician would recreate famous special moves from video games and anime. The magician needed a volunteer and you were lucky enough to get called up! For doing what the magician said, he gave you a souvenir.

event.title: Idol Concert
event.text: There was a music concert where a popular idol group from Japan was performing their hit songs. One of the idols threw some free swag into the audience and you were able to catch it!

event.title: Dance Off
event.text: There was an epic dance battle where two teams would take turns out-dance each other to popular Japanese music. You sat at the front in the audience and hyped up the dancer's performances as they were going on.

event.title: Human Chess Match
event.text: There was a human chess match going on where the person taking the place of the king would give commands to the other pieces. You signed up to participate and got drafted as a rook. You eliminated a few pieces and your piece was pivotal in the late game.

event.title: Game of Ninja
event.text: There was a massive fifty-person game of ninja taking place in an open area of the convention center. You participated in the game, taking out a few people before you got eliminated.

event.title: Quiz Show
event.text: There was a game show-like event where there were two teams of five going at it with their knowledge of anime trivia. You took part in the event and joined a team that needed an extra. You were able to get a few answers correct but ultimately lost the competition.

event.title: Open Mic
event.text: There was an open mic event where people can sign up to perform on stage for 10 minutes at a time. You signed up to perform. While on stage, you performed a simple magic act. The audience enjoyed your performance.

event.title: LARP Battle
event.text: There was a live-action role play battle event where people were given padded weapons to re-enact a famous war scene from an anime. You participated in the war as one of the supporting characters in the anime, defeating some strong enemies.

event.title: TCG Competition
event.text: There was a trading card game tournament at one of the event halls with 64 tournament participants. Since you brought your deck, you participated in the tournament. You were able to steal some wins until you were eliminated by a tougher opponent.

event.title: Painting Event
event.text: There was an event where a famous manga artist would provide hands-on painting lessons to the people participating. Your painting turned out well enough that the famous manga artist stopped by and talked to you.

event.title: Table Top Gaming
event.text: There was a room full of popular table top games where people can play and join games with others. You sat down by a game you wanted to play and had multiple people join you.

event.title: Dating Auction
event.text: There was an event where people would "buy" another person's time in an auction house setting. You participated in the event as an auction piece, and was sold to a nice girl. The two of you spent time together at the auction and became friends.

event.title: Bar Meetup
event.text: There was a meet up at the hotel bar for alcohol enthusiasts. You wandered around the bar talking with different types of people and multiple groups.

event.title: Anime Theory Debates
event.text: There was an event where the host would provide two sides of a controversial topic in an anime and two teams would debate for their given side. You participated in the anime debate and even held the spotlight for a bit.

event.title: Loutube Interview
event.text: There were cameras set up for a popular Loutube channel where the host would interview random passer-bys. You were briefly interviewed by the host, giving your thoughts about the events and the costumes you've seen at the convention.

event.title: Would you Survive in a Zombie Apocalypse?
event.text: There was an interactive game where participants simulate whether or not they would survive a zombie apocalypse. You joined up with a group of survivors and was able to pull your weight to survive to the end of it.

event.title: Free Food
event.text: There was an announcement on the speakers saying that the food trucks are serving free food as a promotion for the day. While waiting in line, you conversed with a group of friends around you. After you all got your food, they invited you to come eat with them.

event.title: Anime Viewing Session
event.text: There was a viewing session for the first episode of a new anime that has yet to be released. After viewing the anime, you discussed your favorite scenes with the host and the actors dressed up as the characters. The host gave you free swag as the actors let you take pictures!

event.title: Ball Pit
event.text: There was a decently sized above-ground ball pit set up in an open area of the convention. Deciding to just go for it you jump in. You stayed in the ball pit for a while with a few others.

event.title: Mech Piloting
event.text: There was a small stage dedicated for people to prototype a small mech suit from Japan. You were able to speak to the engineer, asking them every question you could think of.

event.title: Anime Bingo
event.text: There was a game of anime bingo going on in one of the rooms in the convention center. You joined in and was pretty close to winning. At least you socialized with the others playing the game!

event.title: Swimming Pool Event
event.text: There was a large pool party going on in the hotel by the convention. You felt hesitant before you got into the pool. You enjoyed swimming with the other people.

event.title: Artist Alley Give-away
event.text: Walking through artist alley, you saw a crowd around one stall throwing away free merchandise. Standing in the crowd, you were able to catch one of the more expensive items at the convention. People congratulated you on your good luck!

event.title: Live Pod-Cast Show
event.text: Your favorite podcasting group was hosting a live podcast recording session at the convention. At the end of the podcast, there was a Q&A session. You asked the podcasters a few questions that you've wanted to ask them.

event.title: Para-para Dance Lessons
event.text: A professional dance crew was giving a group dance lesson for the Japanese originated para-para dance. After the dance lessons, other participants complimented your dancing skills as you all talked about what you just learned.

event.title: Improv Show
event.text: There was a group of comedians doing an improv show at the auditorium. Participating in the event, the comedians invited you on to the stage as you quietly became an accessory for their act. They thanked you for participating.

event.title: Vocaloid Concert
event.text: There was a music concert where a Japanese vocaloid hologram was performing her hit songs. Some of the stage hands threw some free swag into the audience and you were able to catch it!

event.title: Bubble Tea Tasting
event.text: There was a bubble tea tasting event where participants can customize their own bubble tea. The bubble tea you created turned out to be extremely good. One person noticed your satisfied expression and asked for your recipe.

event.title: Voice Actor's Meetup
event.text: One of your favorite voice actors of all time was hosting an event at the convention. You were able to ask the voice actor to say their trademark line and caught it on your phone. Maybe you can keep it as a ring tone!

event.title: Koto and Sake Tasting Event
event.text: For the 21 and over crowd, there was a Japanese alcohol tasting social event. You talked with the other attendees, discussing your favorite drinks at the event.

event.title: Cosplay Runway
event.text: There was a cosplay fashion show event where judges would rate a person's cosplay as they would walk down an isle. Attempting to participate as a judge, you were unfortunately turned down. However you were able to be backstage to get a better view of the cosplayers.

event.title: Anime Lazer Tag
event.text: There was a room dedicated to a lazer tag competition where the weapons and the setting was based off of a futuristic anime. You participated in the event and ended up winning with your team!

event.title: Virtual Reality Demo
event.text: There was a kiosk with a high quality VR set up where users can roam around a Japanese high school environment. You ended up being selected to participate in the demo for a few minutes.

event.title: Anime Retrospective
event.text: There was an all-day event dedicated to showcasing old anime from the 1970's - 1990's. While watching classic anime, you mingled with another group as you all discussed the favorite anime of yesteryear. You spent some time with the group after the event.

event.title: Celebrity Cosplayer
event.text: An internet famous cosplayer was making an appearance at the convention. Speaking with the cosplayer, you were able to take some great one-on-one photos with her.

event.title: Celebrity Lip Reading
event.text: There was an event where multiple celebrity voice actors were reading excerpts from a horrid book. You got to take a good video of the voice actors reading through the book with funny voices.

event.title: Free Comic Book Day
event.text: Walking through artist alley, you noticed a comic book kiosk giving away a select few comics. You talked to the person working at the kiosk for a bit to the point that they gave you a premium comic book for free.

event.title: Dating Advice
event.text: There was an event where a popular Loutuber was giving advice about dating. Sitting in the audience, you were surprised when the speaker approached you with the microphone asking for your opinion. You're gonna be on LouTube!

event.title: Mechanical Bull Ride
event.text: An energy drink company was hosting a mechanical bull ride in artist alley where participants could see how long they could last against the bull. You decided to try it out... and did well enough! You talked with other people on how to improve for next time!

event.title: The Grandfather of Anime
event.text: One of the original artists of classic anime movies was making an appearance at the convention. You sat close to the front of a massive auditorium as he spoke about his creations. At the end of the event, you got some signed swag from the grandfather of anime!

event.title: Interactive Display
event.text: Looking above, there was a large TV displaying other rooms in the convention. Noticing somebody on the display looking into the camera, so you stood in front of the camera and had a wordless conversation with them. A few other people joined in on the fun.

event.title: Speed Dating
event.text: There was a speed dating event at the convention where you went on quick two-minute dates with a handful of women. After the event was over you hung out with a few of the girls you met and got a few numbers from the whole thing.

event.title: Photoshoot
event.text: There was a meet up for all of the cosplays for one of your favorite video games. You organized the entire event and befriended all of the people in attendance.

event.title: Figurine Give-away
event.text: At a figurine speciality booth, they were giving away merchandise! You befriended the person running the booth and was able to get an incredibly rare figurine.

event.title: Question and Answer Panel
event.text: There was a question and answer panel for the cast of one of your favorite TV shows. You were able to ask the actors directly your questions and was even able to make them laugh.

event.title: Maid Cafe
event.text: There was a cafe were all of the servers were dressed up as butlers and maids. You ordered a coffee and sat down by yourself. Over time, more and more people started to join your table until your group was the loudest group in the cafe.

event.title: Anime Karaoke
event.text: You saw that there was a karaoke competition specifically for popular songs from Japan. You got a group to join you on stage as you all did a group rendition of an anime theme song. The audience went wild!

event.title: Saturday Night Rave
event.text: In the late night, there was a rave going on at one of the dance halls. While at the rave, you started congo lines, dance-off rings, and in general had a blast with others.

event.title: Celebrity Signing
event.text: At one of the booths, a popular actor from one of your favorite superhero movies was doing a celebrity signing. After having your poster signed, the actor opened up to you for a bit about what it's like being a superhero. The two of you bonded.

event.title: Game Demo
event.text: A game company was at the convention letting people try out their multiplayer arena game that was set to release soon. You were playing so well, that a developer offered to invite you to a closed beta to help them test the game.

event.title: Magic Show
event.text: There was a magic show event where the magician would recreate famous special moves from video games and anime. The magician needed a volunteer and you were called up! While on stage, you made the audience laugh entertaining them further.

event.title: Idol Concert
event.text: There was a music concert where a popular idol group from Japan was performing their hit songs. One of the idols brought you on stage from the audience to sing with her. When you got back to the audience, everyone was saying how you killed it on stage.

event.title: Dance Off
event.text: There was an epic dance battle where two teams would take turns out-dance each other to popular Japanese music. You got pulled on stage by one of the dancers and acted as a hype man!

event.title: Human Chess Match
event.text: There was a human chess match going on where the person taking the place of the king would give commands to the other pieces. You signed up to participate and got drafted as the king. Through trials and tribulation, you were able to lead your team to victory!

event.title: Game of Ninja
event.text: There was a massive fifty-person game of ninja taking place in an open area of the convention center. You participated in the game, taking out a few people before you ultimately won!

event.title: Quiz Show
event.text: There was a game show-like event where there were two teams of five going at it with their knowledge of anime trivia. You took part in the event and joined a team of people you met at the convention. Your team was able to snatch the victory!

event.title: Open Mic
event.text: There was an open mic event where people can sign up to perform on stage for 10 minutes at a time. You signed up to perform. While on stage, you performed a simple magic act with additional bits of comedy. The audience loved your performance!

event.title: LARP Battle
event.text: There was a live-action role play battle event where people were given padded weapons to re-enact a famous war scene from an anime. You participated in the war as the main character of the anime.

event.title: TCG Competition
event.text: There was a trading card game tournament at one of the event halls with 64 tournament participants. Since you brought your deck, you participated in the tournament. You were able to steal the championships winning the entire tournament!

event.title: Painting Event
event.text: There was an event where a famous manga artist would provide hands-on painting lessons to the people participating. Your painting turned out so well that the manga artist talked to you for a while.

event.title: Table Top Gaming
event.text: There was a room full of popular table top games where people can play and join games with others. You sat down by a game you wanted to play and pretty much hosted the game for other people.

event.title: Dating Auction
event.text: There was an event where people would "buy" another person's time in an auction house setting. You participated in the event as an auction piece, and had a few people get try to outbid each other for you. You enjoyed your time with your date.

event.title: Bar Meetup
event.text: There was a meet up at the hotel bar for alcohol enthusiasts. You wandered around the bar introducing yourself to everyone and making new friends over a few beers.

event.title: Anime Theory Debates
event.text: There was an event where the host would provide two sides of a controversial topic in an anime and two teams would debate for their given side. You participated in the debates, leading the discussions and your team to the stronger debate.

event.title: Loutube Interview
event.text: There were cameras set up for a popular Loutube channel where the host would interview random passer-bys. You were interviewed by the host for a while. Your interview took up a good portion of the host's video.

event.title: Would you Survive in a Zombie Apocalypse?
event.text: There was an interactive game where participants simulate whether or not they would survive a zombie apocalypse. You formed a settlement with a bunch of other survivors and was able to lead your people to surviving to the end of the game.

event.title: Free Food
event.text: There was an announcement on the speakers saying that the food trucks are serving free food as a promotion for the day. While waiting in line, you conversed with a group of friends. After you all finished your food, they invited you to their hotel for a party after the convention.

event.title: Anime Viewing Session
event.text: There was a viewing session for the first episode of a new anime that has yet to be released. After viewing the anime, you discussed your favorite scenes with the host and the actors dressed up as the characters. The host gave you a picture from the anime signed by the main author!

event.title: Ball Pit
event.text: There was a decently sized above-ground ball pit set up in an open area of the convention. You jumped in and started a ball pit fight with strangers. You made new friends as you stayed in the ball pit for a while.

event.title: Mech Piloting
event.text: There was a small stage dedicated for people to prototype a small mech suit from Japan. You were able to pilot the mech suit making it walk. When you got out of the mech suit, you were bombarded with compliments on your natural piloting skills.

event.title: Anime Bingo
event.text: There was a game of anime bingo going on in one of the rooms in the convention center. You joined in and was able to take home the grand prize! The other players congratulated you for your win.

event.title: Swimming Pool Event
event.text: There was a large pool party going on in the hotel by the convention. You decided to just go for it and jump in. You had a blast with the other swimmers - getting in to races, splash fights, and diving competitions.

event.title: Artist Alley Give-away
event.text: Walking through artist alley, you saw a crowd around one stall throwing away free merchandise. You were able to catch a lot of free swag. Since you had too much you carry, you gave some of your free swag to the people that didn't catch anything.

event.title: Live Pod-Cast Show
event.text: Your favorite podcasting group was hosting a live podcast recording session at the convention. They asked for a participant to interview and you were randomly selected. Like a dream come true, you got to be on your favorite podcast!

event.title: Para-para Dance Lessons
event.text: A professional dance crew was giving a group dance lesson for the Japanese originated para-para dance. The teachers took note of how quickly you picked para-para dancing and talked to you after the event, bonding over your mutual love of Japanese culture.

event.title: Improv Show
event.text: There was a group of comedians doing an improv show at the auditorium. Participating in the event, the comedians invited you on to the stage as you became a part of the act. You even made people laugh while on stage!

event.title: Vocaloid Concert
event.text: There was a music concert where a Japanese vocaloid hologram was performing her hit songs. The idol took a selfie of herself and the audience and since you were in the front, you were very prominent in the photo.

event.title: Bubble Tea Tasting
event.text: There was a bubble tea tasting event where participants can customize their own bubble tea. The bubble tea you created turned out to be flawless. You shared and traded recipes with the other participants that made good teas.

event.title: Voice Actor's Meetup
event.text: One of your favorite voice actors of all time was hosting an event at the convention. You were able to ask the voice actor to say a very funny line and made the whole room laugh.

event.title: Koto and Sake Tasting Event
event.text: For the 21 and over crowd, there was a Japanese alcohol tasting social event. You played bartender for the event and poured people's drinks for them. You got to socialize with most of the people at the event!

event.title: Cosplay Runway
event.text: There was a cosplay fashion show event where judges would rate a person's cosplay as they would walk down an isle. You were able to participate as a judge and took some quality photos from the judge's booth.

event.title: Anime Lazer Tag
event.text: There was a room dedicated to a lazer tag competition where the weapons and the setting was based off of a futuristic anime. You participated in the event and dominated the event!

event.title: Virtual Reality Demo
event.text: There was a kiosk with a high quality VR set up where users can roam around a Japanese high school environment. You ended up being selected to participate in the demo for a long time! You made some friends in the VR world...

event.title: Anime Retrospective
event.text: There was an all-day event dedicated to showcasing old anime from the 1970's - 1990's. While watching classic anime, you mingled with another group as you all discussed the favorite anime of yesteryear. You spent some time with the group after the event.

event.title: Celebrity Cosplayer
event.text: An internet famous cosplayer was making an appearance at the convention. Speaking with the cosplayer, you were able to take some phenomenal one-on-one photos with her. They look professionally done!

event.title: Celebrity Lip Reading
event.text: There was an event where multiple celebrity voice actors were reading excerpts from a horrid book. You got to take a close-up video of the voice actors reading through the book. The video looks professional! It may even become viral on Loutube...

event.title: Free Comic Book Day
event.text: Walking through artist alley, you noticed a comic book kiosk giving away a select few comics. You talked to the person working at the kiosk for a while until they told you about their hidden stash. They gave you a bunch of signed premium comic book for free.

event.title: Dating Advice
event.text: There was an event where a popular Loutuber was giving advice about dating. The speaker asked for volunteers for a demonstration. You raised your hand, and got to be his guinea pig to help prove his point on attracting members of the opposite sex. You're gonna be on LouTube!

event.title: Mechanical Bull Ride
event.text: An energy drink company was hosting a mechanical bull ride in artist alley where participants could see how long they could last against the bull. You decided to try it out... and lasted a long time! People are impressed and congratulated you!

event.text: One of the original artists of classic anime movies was making an appearance at the convention. You sat close to the front of a massive auditorium as he spoke about his creations. There was Q&A at the end and you got to tell the grandfather of anime how much he meant to you.

event.title: Interactive Display
event.text: Looking above, there was a large TV displaying other rooms in the convention. Noticing somebody on the display looking into the camera, you stood in front of the camera and made contact with them. Others joined in as you all had fun goofing off one the camera.

event.text: There was a speed dating event at the convention where you went on quick two-minute dates with a handful of women. There was one girl you met that you really clicked with...
